Jupyter notebooks

Obtain Betas in radiation dominated epoch

1from betaPBH import functions, constants, constraints, BfN, BfS
2import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
3import numpy as np

4functions.put_M_array(0.0123)

 5M_tot = np.array(constraints.M_tot)
 6omega=1/3
 7
 8funtions.Betas_DM(M_tot)
 9funtions.Betas_BBN(M_tot,omega)
10funtions.Betas_CMB_AN(M_tot,omega)
11funtions.Betas_GRB(M_tot,omega)
12funtions.Betas_Reio(M_tot,omega)
13funtions.Betas_SD(M_tot,omega)
14funtions.Betas_LSP(M_tot)

15funtions.get_Betas_full(M_tot)

16plt.loglog(M_tot,constraints.betas_full,"k:")
17plt.ylim([1e-30,1e-13])
18plt.xlim([1e-2,1e20])
19plt.show()

out:

Computing abundances with efolds

\(\beta_{PBH} = \beta(N_{\rm reh}, \omega, \gamma_{\rm reh})\)

1from betaPBH import functions, constants, constraints, BfN, BfS
2import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
3import numpy as np

4functions.put_M_array(0.0123)
5M_tot = np.array(constraints.M_tot)

 6plt.loglog(M_tot,BfN.get_betas_reh_tot(10,0,1),label = r"$N_{\rm reh}=10$")
 7plt.loglog(M_tot,BfN.get_betas_reh_tot(20,0,1),label = r"$N_{\rm reh}=20$")
 8plt.loglog(M_tot,BfN.get_betas_reh_tot(30,0,1),label = r"$N_{\rm reh}=30$")
 9plt.ylim([1e-30,1])
10plt.xlim([1,1e20])
11plt.xlabel(r"$M_{\rm PBH}~[\rm{g}]$")
12plt.ylabel(r"$\beta$")
13plt.legend(ncol=2,bbox_to_anchor=(0.85, 1.5))
14plt.show()

out:

Computing abundances with Stiff

\(\beta_{PBH} = \beta(N_{\rm stiff}, \omega, \gamma_{\rm stiff})\)

1from betaPBH import functions, constants, constraints, BfN, BfS
2import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
3import numpy as np

4functions.put_M_array(0.0123)
5M_tot = np.array(constraints.M_tot)

 6plt.loglog(M_tot,BfS.get_betas_stiff_tot(5,1.,1.),"k",label = r"$N_{\rm stiff} = 5$",alpha = 0.8)
 7plt.loglog(M_tot,BfS.get_betas_stiff_tot(10,1.,1.),"k",label = r"$N_{\rm stiff} = 10$",alpha = 0.8)
 8plt.loglog(M_tot,BfS.get_betas_stiff_tot(15,1.,1.),"k",label = r"$N_{\rm stiff} = 15$",alpha = 0.8)
 9plt.xlabel(r"$M_{\rm PBH}~[\rm{g}]$")
10plt.ylabel(r"$\beta$")
11plt.ylim([1e-40,1e-5])
12plt.xlim([1,1e20])
13plt.legend(ncol=2,bbox_to_anchor=(0.85, 1.5))
14plt.show()

out:
